agents.name: Brimstone
agents.story: Brimstone is a former firefighter from the USA who uses his orbital arsenal to support his team and control the battlefield.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that deploys a damaging field of fire.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Target a nearby location to call in a Stim Beacon, granting all players in its radius rapid fire.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Use your map to call in orbital deployment smokescreens that obscure vision.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Use your map to target a location, launching a devastating orbital strike.

agents.name: Viper
agents.story: Viper, an American chemist, deploys an array of poisonous chemical devices to control the battlefield and choke the enemy's vision. If the toxins don't kill her prey, her mind games surely will.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: EQUIP a chemical launcher. FIRE to launch a canister that shatters upon hitting the floor, creating a lingering chemical zone that damages and applies Vulnerable to enemies.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: EQUIP a gas emitter. FIRE to throw the emitter that perpetually remains throughout the round. RE-USE the ability to create a toxic gas cloud at the cost of fuel. This ability can be picked up to be redeployed.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: EQUIP a gas emitter launcher. FIRE to deploy a long line of gas emitters. RE-USE the ability to create a tall wall of toxic gas at the cost of fuel.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.description: EQUIP a chemical sprayer. FIRE to spray a massive cloud in all directions around Viper, creating a large cloud that reduces the vision range and maximum health of enemies inside of it.

agents.name: Omen
agents.story: Omen is a mysterious figure who hunts in the shadows, using his abilities to obscure vision and teleport across the battlefield, instilling fear and confusion among his enemies.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: EQUIP a shadow walk ability and see its range indicator. FIRE to begin a brief channel, then teleport to the marked location.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: INSTANTLY fire a shadow projectile forward, briefly reducing the vision range of all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: EQUIP a shadow orb and see its range indicator. FIRE to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creating a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision. HOLD ALTERNATE FIRE while targeting to move the marker further away. HOLD the ability key while targeting to move the marker closer.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting, Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel his teleport, or PRESS EQUIP for Omen to cancel his teleport.

agents.name: Killjoy
agents.story: Killjoy is a German tech expert who uses her arsenal of inventions to secure the battlefield and support her team.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: EQUIP a Nanoswarm grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade. Upon landing, the Nanoswarm goes covert. ACTIVATE the Nanoswarm to deploy a damaging swarm of nanobots.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: EQUIP a covert Alarmbot. FIRE to deploy a bot that hunts down enemies that get in range. After reaching its target, the bot explodes, applying Vulnerable. HOLD EQUIP to recall a deployed bot.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: EQUIP a Turret. FIRE to deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180 degree cone. HOLD EQUIP to recall the deployed turret.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: EQUIP the Lockdown device. FIRE to deploy the device. After a long windup, the device detains all enemies caught in the radius. The device can be destroyed by enemies.

agents.name: Cypher
agents.story: Cypher is a Moroccan information broker who uses his network of spy gadgets to keep tabs on enemies and secure areas.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Place a stealthed tripwire between two walls, triggering and restraining enemies who cross it.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Place a remote activation trap that creates a cage that blocks vision and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Place a remote camera that you can activate to view its video feed.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: Extract information from a dead enemy, revealing the location of their living allies.

agents.name: Sova
agents.story: Sova is a Russian archer who tracks, finds, and eliminates enemies with ruthless efficiency and precision.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fire an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of static energy.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploy a drone that can be piloted and fires a dart that reveals enemies.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fire a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter, revealing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Fire up to three deadly energy blasts that spear across the entire map.

agents.name: Sage
agents.story: Sage is a Radiant monk from China who uses her healing and protective abilities to safeguard her team, providing stability and support on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a barrier orb. FIRE places a solid wall that fortifies after a few seconds. ALT FIRE rotates the targeter.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a slowing orb. FIRE to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a healing orb. FIRE with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to activate a heal-over-time on them. ALT FIRE while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: EQUIP a resurrection ability. FIRE with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.

agents.name: Phoenix
agents.story: Phoenix is a UK-based Radiant who commands fire to control the battlefield, using his flames to heal himself and hinder his enemies.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: EQUIP a flame wall. FIRE to create a line of flame that moves forward, creating a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages players passing through it. HOLD FIRE to bend the wall in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: EQUIP a fireball. FIRE to throw a fireball that explodes after a set amount of time or upon hitting the ground, creating a lingering fire zone that damages enemies. The fire zone heals Phoenix instead of dealing damage.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: EQUIP a flare orb that takes a curving path and detonates shortly after throwing. FIRE to curve the flare orb to the left, detonating and blinding any player who sees the orb. ALTERNATE FIRE to curve the flare orb to the right.

abilities.name: Run It Back
abilities.description: INSTANTLY place a marker at Phoenix's location. While this ability is active, dying or allowing the timer to expire will end this ability and bring Phoenix back to this location with full health.

agents.name: Jett
agents.story: Jett, hailing from South Korea, is an agile and evasive fighter who uses her wind-based abilities to outmaneuver opponents and strike swiftly.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surface. HOLD the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: INSTANTLY propel Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: ACTIVATE to prepare a gust of wind for a limited time. RE-USE the wind to propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still, she propels forward.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.

agents.name: Reyna
agents.story: Forged in the heart of Mexico, Reyna dominates single combat, popping off with each kill she scores. Her capability is only limited by her raw skill, making her highly dependent on performance.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: EQUIP an ethereal, destructible eye. ACTIVATE to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will Nearsight all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, rapidly healing for a short duration. Health gained through this skill exceeding 100 will decay over time. If Empress is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the orb.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. If Empress is active, also become invisible.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: INSTANTLY enter a frenzy, increasing firing, equip, and reload speed dramatically. Gain infinite charges of Soul Harvest abilities.

agents.name: Raze
agents.story: Raze, hailing from Brazil, is a fearless and impulsive explosives expert known for her big personality and even bigger weapons. With a love for chaos and destruction, she uses her arsenal of explosives to clear paths and create opportunities for her team, making her a formidable force on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: EQUIP a Boom Bot. FIRE to deploy the bot, causing it to travel in a straight line on the ground, bouncing off walls. The Boom Bot locks onto any enemies in its frontal cone and chases them, exploding for heavy damage if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a Blast Pack that sticks to surfaces. RE-USE the ability after deployment to detonate, damaging and moving anything hit. Raze isn't damaged by this ability but can use it for mobility.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: EQUIP a cluster grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade, which deals damage and creates sub-munitions, each dealing damage to anyone in their range. The ability refreshes after two kills.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: EQUIP a rocket launcher. FIRE to shoot a rocket that deals massive area damage on contact with anything.

agents.name: Breach
agents.story: Breach is a Swedish bionic enforcer who uses his powerful bionic arms to force his way through enemy lines and create opportunities for his team.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Fire a slow-firing burst through a wall that deals heavy damage to anyone caught in its area.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: Equip a blinding charge that can be set on a wall, blinding anyone on the other side.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: Create a seismic blast that dazes and knocks up anyone in its line.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Create a cascading quake in a cone that dazes and knocks up anyone caught in it.

agents.name: Skye
agents.story: Hailing from Australia, Skye and her band of beasts trail-blaze the way through hostile territory. With her creations hampering the enemy and her power to heal others, the team is strongest and safest by Skye's side.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: EQUIP a healing trinket. HOLD FIRE to channel, healing allies in range and line of sight. Can be reused until her healing pool is depleted. Skye cannot heal herself.

abilities.name: Trailblazer
abilities.description: EQUIP a Tasmanian tiger trinket. FIRE to send out and take control of the predator. While in control, FIRE to leap forward, exploding in a concussive blast and damaging directly hit enemies.

abilities.name: Guiding Light
abilities.description: EQUIP a hawk trinket. FIRE to send it forward. HOLD FIRE to guide the hawk in the direction of your crosshair. RE-USE while the hawk is in flight to transform it into a flash that plays a hit confirm if an enemy was within range and line of sight.

abilities.name: Seekers
abilities.description: EQUIP a Seeker trinket. FIRE to send out three Seekers to track down the three closest enemies. If a Seeker reaches its target, it nearsights them. Enemies can destroy the Seekers.

agents.name: Yoru
agents.story: Yoru is a Japanese native who rips holes straight through reality to infiltrate enemy lines unseen. Using deception and aggression in equal measure, he gets the drop on each target before they know where to look.

abilities.name: Fakeout
abilities.description: EQUIP an echo that transforms into a mirror image of Yoru when activated. FIRE to instantly activate the mirror image and send it forward. ALT FIRE to place an inactive echo. USE to transform an inactive echo into a mirror image and send it forward. Mirror images explode in a blinding flash when destroyed by enemies.

abilities.name: Blindside
abilities.description: EQUIP to rip an unstable dimensional fragment from reality. FIRE to throw the fragment, activating a flash that winds up once it collides with a hard surface in world.

abilities.name: Gatecrash
abilities.description: EQUIP to harness a rift tether. FIRE to send the tether out moving forward. ALT FIRE to place a tether in place. ACTIVATE to teleport to the tether's location.

abilities.name: Dimensional Drift
abilities.description: EQUIP a mask that can see between dimensions. FIRE to drift into Yoru's dimension, becoming unable to be affected or seen by enemies from the outside.

agents.name: Astra
agents.story: Astra is a Ghanaian agent who harnesses the energies of the cosmos to reshape battlefields to her whim. With full command of her astral form and a talent for deep strategic foresight, she's always eons ahead of her enemy's next move.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to form a Gravity Well. Players in the area are pulled toward the center before it explodes, making all players still trapped inside Vulnerable.

abilities.name: Nova Pulse
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to detonate a Nova Pulse. The Nova Pulse charges briefly then strikes, concussing all players in its area.

abilities.name: Nebula / Dissipate
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). USE a Star to Dissipate it, returning the Star to be placed in a new location after a delay. Dissipate briefly forms a fake Nebula at the Star's location before returning.

abilities.name: Stars
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. ACTIVATE a Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). USE a Star to Dissipate it, returning the Star to be placed in a new location after a delay. Dissipate briefly forms a fake Nebula at the Star's location before returning.

abilities.name: Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: ACTIVATE to enter Astral Form where you can place Stars with FIRE. Stars can be reactivated later, transforming them into a Nova Pulse, Nebula, or Gravity Well. When Cosmic Divide is charged, use ALT FIRE in Astral Form to begin aiming it, then FIRE to select two locations. An infinite Cosmic Divide connects the two points you select. Cosmic Divide blocks bullets and heavily dampens audio.

agents.name: KAY/O
agents.story: KAY/O is a machine of war built for a single purpose: neutralizing Radiants. His power to suppress enemy abilities dismantles his opponents' capacity to fight back, securing him and his allies the ultimate edge.

abilities.name: FRAG/ment
abilities.description: EQUIP an explosive fragment. FIRE to throw. The fragment sticks to the floor and explodes multiple times, dealing near-lethal damage at the center with each explosion.

abilities.name: FLASH/drive
abilities.description: EQUIP a flash grenade. FIRE to overhand throw. ALT FIRE to lob. The flash grenade explodes after a short fuse, blinding anyone in line of sight.

abilities.name: ZERO/point
abilities.description: EQUIP a suppression blade. FIRE to throw. The blade sticks to the first surface it hits, winds up, and suppresses anyone in the radius of the explosion.

abilities.name: NULL/cmd
abilities.description: INSTANTLY overload with polarized radianite energy that pulses from KAY/O in a massive radius. Enemies hit with pulses are suppressed for a short duration. While overloaded, KAY/O gains Combat Stim and can be re-stabilized if downed.

agents.name: Chamber
agents.story: Chamber, whose real name is Vincent Fabron, is a French weapons designer and former head of a covert international operations unit. He combines his technical acumen with a flair for style, making him one of the most formidable and intriguing agents in Valorant.

abilities.name: Trademark
abilities.description: Place a trap that scans for enemies. When a visible enemy comes in range, the trap counts down and then destabilizes the terrain around them, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.description: Activate to equip a heavy pistol. Alt fire with the pistol equipped to aim down sights.

abilities.name: Rendezvous
abilities.description: Place two teleport anchors. While on the ground and in range of an anchor, reactivate to teleport to the other anchor. The anchors can be picked up to be redeployed.

abilities.name: Tour de Force
abilities.description: Activate to summon a powerful, custom sniper rifle that will kill any enemy with any direct hit. Killing an enemy creates a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

agents.name: Neon
agents.story: Neon is a Filipino agent who surges forward at shocking speeds, discharging bursts of bioelectric radiance as fast as her body generates it. She races ahead to catch enemies off guard, then strikes them down quicker than lightning.

abilities.name: Fast Lane
abilities.description: FIRE two energy lines forward on the ground that extend a short distance or until they hit a surface. The lines rise into walls of static electricity that block vision.

abilities.name: Relay Bolt
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw an energy bolt that bounces once. Upon hitting each surface, the bolt electrifies the ground below with a concussive blast.

abilities.name: High Gear
abilities.description: INSTANTLY channel Neon's power for increased speed. When charged, ALT FIRE to trigger an electric slide dash. Slide charge resets every two kills.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Unleash Neon's full power and speed for a short duration. FIRE to channel the power into a deadly lightning beam with high movement accuracy.

agents.name: Fade
agents.story: Fade is a Turkish bounty hunter who unleashes the power of raw nightmares to seize enemy secrets. Attuned with terror itself, she hunts targets and reveals their deepest fears—before crushing them in the dark.

abilities.name: Prowler
abilities.description: EQUIP a prowler. FIRE sends the prowler forward, causing it to lock onto any enemies or trails in its path, and chase them, nearsighting them if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Seize
abilities.description: EQUIP an orb of nightmare ink. FIRE to throw the orb, which will plummet to the ground after a set amount of time. Upon hitting the ground, the ink will explode and create a zone in which enemies caught in it cannot escape by normal means.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: EQUIP a nightmarish entity. FIRE to throw the orb, which will plummet to the ground after a set amount of time. Upon hitting the ground, the orb will turn into a nightmarish entity that reveals the location of enemies caught in its line of sight. Enemies can destroy this entity.

abilities.name: Nightfall
abilities.description: EQUIP the power of fear. FIRE to send out a wave of nightmare energy that can pass through walls. The energy creates a trail to affected enemies and deafens and decays them.

agents.name: Harbor
agents.story: Hailing from India's coast, Harbor storms the field wielding ancient technology with dominion over water. He unleashes frothing rapids and crushing waves to shield his allies, or pummel those that oppose him.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description: EQUIP a wave of water. FIRE to send the wave rolling forward and through walls. RE-USE to stop the wave. Players hit are SLOWED.

abilities.name: Cove
abilities.description: EQUIP a sphere of shielding water. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to underhand throw. Upon impacting the ground, spawn a water shield that blocks bullets.

abilities.name: High Tide
abilities.description: EQUIP a wall of water. FIRE to send the water forward along the ground. HOLD FIRE to guide the water in the direction of your crosshair, spawning a wall along the water's path. ALT FIRE to stop the water early. Players hit are SLOWED.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: EQUIP the full power of your Artifact. FIRE to summon a geyser pool on the ground. Enemy players in the area are targeted by successive geyser strikes. Players caught within a strike are CONCUSSED.

agents.name: Gekko
agents.story: Gekko, hailing from Los Angeles, leads a tight-knit crew of calamitous creatures. His buddies bound forward, scattering enemies out of the way, with Gekko chasing them down to regroup and go again.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: EQUIP Mosh. FIRE to throw Mosh like a grenade. Upon landing, Mosh duplicates across a large area and, after a short delay, explodes, dealing damage to enemies within the zone.

abilities.name: Wingman
abilities.description: EQUIP Wingman. FIRE to send Wingman forward seeking enemies. Wingman unleashes a concussive blast toward the first enemy he sees. ALT FIRE when targeting a Spike site or planted Spike to have Wingman defuse or plant the Spike. To plant, Gekko must have the Spike in his inventory.

abilities.name: Dizzy
abilities.description: EQUIP Dizzy. FIRE to send Dizzy soaring forward through the air. Dizzy charges then unleashes plasma blasts at enemies in line of sight. Enemies hit by her plasma are blinded.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.description: EQUIP Thrash. FIRE to link with Thrash's mind and steer her through enemy territory. ACTIVATE to lunge forward and explode, detaining any players in a small radius.

agents.name: Deadlock
agents.story: Deadlock is a Norwegian operative who deploys an array of cutting-edge nanowire to secure the battlefield from even the most lethal assault.

abilities.name: GravNet
abilities.description: EQUIP a GravNet grenade. FIRE to throw. ALT FIRE to lob. The GravNet detonates upon landing, forcing any enemies caught within to crouch and move slowly.

abilities.name: Sonic Sensor
abilities.description: EQUIP a Sonic Sensor. FIRE to deploy. The sensor monitors an area for enemies making sound. It concusses that area if footsteps, weapons fire, or significant noise are detected.

abilities.name: Barrier Mesh
abilities.description: EQUIP a Barrier Mesh disc. FIRE to throw forward. Upon landing, the disc generates barriers from the origin point that block character movement.

abilities.name: Annihilation
abilities.description: EQUIP a Nanowire Accelerator. FIRE to unleash a pulse of nanowires that captures the first enemy contacted. The cocooned enemy is pulled along a nanowire path and will die if they reach the end, unless they are freed. The nanowire cocoon is destructible.

agents.name: Iso
agents.story: Iso is a Chinese fixer for hire who falls into a flow state to dismantle the opposition. Reconfiguring ambient energy into bulletproof protection, he advances with focus towards his next duel to the death.

abilities.name: Contingency
abilities.description: EQUIP to assemble prismatic energy. FIRE to push an indestructible wall of energy forward that blocks bullets.

abilities.name: Undercut
abilities.description: EQUIP a molecular bolt. FIRE to throw it forward, applying a brief FRAGILE to all players it touches. The bolt can pass through solid objects, including walls.

abilities.name: Double Tap
abilities.description: START a focus timer. Once completed, enter a flow state during which downed enemies you kill or damage generate an energy orb. Shooting this orb grants you a shield which absorbs one instance of damage from any source.

abilities.name: Kill Contract
abilities.description: EQUIP an interdimensional arena. FIRE to hurl a column of energy through the battlefield, pulling you and the first enemy hit into the arena. You and your opponent duel to the death.

agents.name: Clove
agents.story: Clove is a Scottish troublemaker who makes mischief for enemies in both the heat of combat and the cold of death. The young immortal keeps foes guessing, even from beyond the grave, their return to the living only ever a moment away.

abilities.name: Pick-Me-Up
abilities.description: INSTANTLY absorb the life force of a fallen enemy that Clove damaged or killed, gaining haste and temporary health.

abilities.name: Meddle
abilities.description: EQUIP a fragment of immortality essence. FIRE to throw the fragment, which erupts after a short delay and temporarily decays all targets caught inside.

abilities.name: Ruse
abilities.description: EQUIP to view the battlefield. FIRE to set the locations where Clove’s clouds will settle. ALT FIRE to confirm, launching clouds that block vision in the chosen areas. Clove can use this ability after death.

abilities.name: Not Dead Yet
abilities.description: After dying, ACTIVATE to resurrect. Once resurrected, Clove must earn a kill or a damaging assist within a set time or they will die. REACTIVATE to cancel early.

agents.name: Vyse
agents.story: Vyse is a metallic mastermind who uses liquid metal to isolate, trap, and disarm her enemies. Through cunning and manipulation, she forces all who oppose her to fear the battlefield itself.

abilities.name: Razorvine
abilities.description: EQUIP a nest of liquid metal. FIRE to launch. Upon landing, the nest becomes invisible. When activated, it expands into razorvine, slowing and damaging enemies who pass through.

abilities.name: Arc Rose
abilities.description: EQUIP an Arc Rose. FIRE to place a stealthed Arc Rose on a surface. REUSE to blind all players looking at it. The Arc Rose can be picked up and redeployed.

abilities.name: Shear
abilities.description: EQUIP filaments of liquid metal. FIRE to place a hidden wall trap. When an enemy crosses, an indestructible wall bursts from the ground behind them, blocking their retreat.

abilities.name: Steel Garden
abilities.description: EQUIP a device that, upon activation, creates a large area of razorvine, severely damaging and slowing enemies within. The area persists for a duration, controlling space effectively.

agents.name: Tejo
agents.story: Tejo is a Colombian agent who utilizes advanced technology to control the battlefield, deploying tactical strikes and reconnaissance tools to disrupt enemy plans and support his team.

abilities.name: Guided Salvo
abilities.description: EQUIP an AR targeting system. FIRE to select up to two target locations on the map. ALT FIRE to launch missiles that autonomously navigate to target locations, detonating on arrival.

abilities.name: Stealth Drone
abilities.description: EQUIP a stealth drone. FIRE to deploy the drone forward and assume direct control of its movement. FIRE again to trigger a pulse that suppresses and reveals enemies hit.

abilities.name: Special Delivery
abilities.description: EQUIP a sticky grenade. FIRE to launch it; the grenade sticks to the first surface it hits and explodes, concussing any targets caught in the blast. ALT FIRE to launch the grenade with a single bounce.

abilities.name: Armageddon
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical strike targeting map. FIRE to select the origin point of the strike. FIRE again to set the end point and launch the attack, unleashing a wave of explosions along the strike path.
